name: Office Package
description: Office PC as the center of the office. In the modern office, the computer is usually the center of daily work. You use it to answer e-mails, participate in video chats and work with Word, Excel, and many other applications.

name: Online Class Package
description: A computer - either desktop or laptop - is the most basic tool necessary for completing an online class. The computer is used to access coursework, complete and submit assignments, and interact with professors and fellow students.

name: Gaming Package
description: A gaming computer, also known as a gaming PC, is a specialized personal computer designed for playing video games at very high standards. Gaming PCs typically differ from mainstream personal computers by using high-performance video cards and high core-count central processing units with raw performance.

name: 8 GB DDR4 2400mhz RAM
description: Random access memory (RAM) is a computer's short-term memory, which it uses to handle all active tasks and apps. None of your programs, files, games, or streams would work without RAM

name: Power Supply
description: a device providing power to electronic equipment and sometimes designated A, B, or C according to its function of heating vacuum tube cathodes, causing a flow of electron current in plate circuits, or applying a direct voltage in grid circuits.

name: Motherboard
description: A motherboard is the main printed circuit board (PCB) in a computer. The motherboard is a computer's central communications backbone connectivity point, through which all components and external peripherals connect.

name: Processor Intel Core i7-XXXX
description: Intel processors are the most popular CPUs for desktops and laptops in the world. They're offered in a range of model families, with names like Core, Xeon, Pentium, and Celeron. They come in multiple generations like 9th, 10th, and 11th, also called Coffee Lake, Comet/Ice Lake, and Rocket/Tiger Lake.

name: Processor AMD Ryzen 7 XXXX
description: An AMD processor can be used with the same software as an IntelÂ® processor, but not the same motherboard. A new generation of AMD processor also aims to combine a CPU and graphics processor into a single chip. An AMD processor is a computer processor designed or manufactures by the Advanced Micro Devices company.
